name: The Basics
footer:
Resources used for this survey:
 * All of Us
 * US2020 Census
 * NHANES
 * GenIUSS group (Gender Identity in U.S. Surveillance)
 * National Health Interview Survey (NHIS)
 * Behavioral Risk Factor Surveillance System (BRFSS)
 * NHCHC
 * OurHealth

elements.name: oh_oh_basic_intro
elements.html:
About You

Please answer each question as honestly as possible. There are no right or wrong answers to any of the questions. We are looking for your own answers, and not what you think your doctors, family, or friends want you to say. If you do not want to answer, please select “Prefer not to answer” and move to the next question.

elements.name: oh_oh_basic_firstName
elements.title: First name

elements.name: oh_oh_basic_lastName
elements.title: Last name

elements.name: oh_oh_basic_middleInitial
elements.title: Middle initial

elements.name: oh_oh_basic_dateOfBirth
elements.title: Date of Birth

elements.name: oh_oh_basic_mghPatient
elements.title: Are you a patient, current or former, of Mass General Brigham (Massachusetts General Hospital, Brigham & Women’s Hospital, and/or other Mass General Brigham institutions)?

elements.name: oh_oh_basic_weightUnit
elements.title: I would like to enter my weight in:

elements.name: oh_oh_basic_rawWeightPounds
elements.title: Weight in {oh_oh_basic_weightUnit}

validators.text: Enter a number between 1 and 1000. (Enter 1000 if you weigh more than that.)

elements.name: oh_oh_basic_rawWeightKilos
elements.title: Weight in {oh_oh_basic_weightUnit}

validators.text: Enter a number between 1 and 500. (Enter 500 if you weigh more than that.)

elements.name: oh_oh_basic_heightUnit
elements.title: I would like to enter my height in:

elements.name: oh_oh_basic_rawHeightCm
elements.title: Height in {oh_oh_basic_heightUnit}

elements.name: oh_oh_basic_rawHeightFeet
elements.title: Height - feet

elements.name: oh_oh_basic_rawHeightInches
elements.title: inches

validators.text: Enter a number between 1 and 11. Half inches can be entered as .5 (example: 7.5).

elements.name: oh_oh_basic_birthSex
elements.title: What was your biological sex assigned at birth?

elements.name: oh_oh_basic_gender
elements.title: Which term best describes your gender identity?
elements.otherText: None of these describe me, and I’d like to write my own description

elements.name: oh_oh_basic_sexualOrientation
elements.title: Which of the following best represents how you think of yourself? (Check all that apply)

choices.text: None of these describe me, and I’d like to see additional options

elements.name: oh_oh_basic_sexualOrientationFollowUp
elements.title: Are any of these a closer description of how you think of yourself? (Check all that apply)

choices.text: Have not figured out or are in the process of figuring out your sexuality
Mostly straight, but sometimes attracted to people of your own sex
Do not think of yourself as having sexuality
Do not use labels to identify yourself

elements.name: ethnicityNote
elements.html: Note, you are eligible for this study because you identify as South Asian, defined as ancestry from Bangladesh, Bhutan, India, Maldives, Nepal, Pakistan, and/or Sri Lanka.

elements.name: oh_oh_basic_otherEthnicity
elements.title: Outside of South Asian ethnicity, do you identify with other racial/ethnic categories?

choices.text: No, I only identify with South Asian ethnicity.

elements.name: oh_oh_basic_otherEthnicityDetail
elements.title: Check all that apply.

choices.text: Native American (American Indian or Alaska Native)
Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander

elements.name: oh_oh_basic_nationalIdentity
elements.title: With which of the following South Asian nations do you or your family identify? Check all that apply.
elements.otherErrorText: A description is required for choices of 'other'

elements.name: oh_oh_basic_bangladeshRegion
elements.title: From BANGLADESH: Please choose which state(s) and/or union territories you or your family identifies with. Check all that apply.
elements.otherErrorText: A description is required for choices of 'other'

elements.name: oh_oh_basic_indiaRegion
elements.title: From INDIA: Please choose which state(s) and/or union territories you or your family identifies with. Check all that apply.
elements.otherErrorText: A description is required for choices of 'other'

choices.text: Dadra Nagar Haveli and Daman Diu

elements.name: oh_oh_basic_pakistanRegion
elements.title: From PAKISTAN: Please choose which state(s) and/or union territories you or your family identifies with. Check all that apply.
elements.otherErrorText: A description is required for choices of 'other'

elements.name: oh_oh_basic_asianLanguage
elements.title: Which of the national language(s) in South Asia would you consider to be your “mother tongue”, or most identified with your family? Check all that apply.
elements.otherErrorText: A description is required for choices of 'other'

elements.name: oh_oh_basic_mailingIntro
elements.html:
Mailing Address

We ask this so that we may send you a saliva collection kit.

elements.name: oh_oh_basic_streetAddress
elements.title: Address

elements.name: oh_oh_basic_city
elements.title: City

elements.name: oh_oh_basic_state
elements.title: State

elements.name: oh_oh_basic_zip
elements.title: ZIP Code (5 digits)

elements.name: oh_oh_basic_phoneNumber
elements.title: Preferred Phone Number

elements.name: oh_oh_basic_livingIntro
elements.html: Living in the United States, Citizenship, Parents, and Relationship Status

elements.name: oh_oh_basic_settledOtherRegions
elements.title: Have any generations of your family settled in any of the following regions? Check all that apply.

choices.text: Asia/Pacific Islands (Fiji, Indonesia, Malaysia, and/or Singapore)
Caribbean (Guyana, Jamaica, Suriname, and Trinidad & Tobago)

elements.name: oh_oh_basic_continuousGenerations
elements.title: We are interested in learning more about the South Asian Diaspora. Which of the following best applies to you?

choices.text: My great-grandparents or an older generation were the first to leave South Asia.
My grandparents were the first to leave South Asia.
My parents were the first to leave South Asia.
I was the first to leave South Asia.

elements.name: oh_oh_basic_citizenship
elements.title: What is your citizenship status?
elements.description: This type of question helps us to ensure we are surveying a diverse group of South Asians in the US

elements.name: oh_oh_basic_citizenship_us
elements.title: Which of the following best describes your US citizenship status?

choices.text: I am a US citizen by birth
I am a naturalized US citizen

elements.name: oh_oh_basic_residencyInUS
elements.title: When did you arrive the in the US?

choices.text: I was born in the US
I came to the US after I was born

elements.name: oh_oh_basic_yearCameToUS
elements.title: In what year did you come to live in the United States?

elements.name: oh_oh_basic_parentsRelated
elements.title: Are your parents related to each other by blood?

elements.name: oh_oh_basic_parentsRelatedHow
elements.title: How were your parents related?

elements.name: oh_oh_basic_maritalStatus
elements.title: What is your marital status?

elements.name: oh_oh_basic_otherPeopleAtHome
elements.title: Not including yourself, how many other people live at home with you?

elements.name: oh_oh_basic_religiousBackground
elements.title: Which best describe(s) your religious background? Check all that apply.
elements.otherErrorText: A description is required for choices of 'other'

elements.name: oh_oh_basic_howImportantReligion
elements.title: How important is religion in your life?

elements.name: oh_oh_basic_educationLevel
elements.title: What is the highest grade or year of school you completed?

choices.text: Never attended school or only attended kindergarten
1 to 3 years after high school (Some college, Associate’s degree, or technical school)

elements.name: oh_oh_basic_employmentStatus
elements.title: What is your current employment status? Check all that apply.

choices.text: Unable to work due to sickness or disability

elements.name: oh_oh_basic_householdIncome
elements.title:
One of the things we're trying to understand is how people's income may affect their use of health services.

What is your annual household income from all sources? Household income includes your income plus the income of all family members in your household for the last calendar year. Include all wages and other sources of income.

elements.name: oh_oh_basic_ownOrRent
elements.title: Do you own or rent the place where you live?

choices.text: Live with family (I am not the homeowner and do not pay rent)

elements.name: oh_oh_basic_currentLivingLocation
elements.title: Where are you currently living?

choices.text: In a group home, nursing home, or other residential facility
Anywhere outside (e.g., street, vehicle, abandoned building)
